title: This is why i hate the boards
body: You can be put on a pedestal for discussing simply "fizz needs a nerf" but the moment you mention {{champion:11}} EVERYONE defends him like seriously i find Yi right now more aggravating than a fizz tbh. True dmg, heavy dmg reduction in W which heals which NOW pauses his ultimate there's literally no reason to pick {{champion:102}} when {{champion:11}} exists imo.

replies.body: Yi has counterplay. Fizz's Troll pole counterplays...

> [{quoted}](name=FooDang,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=68rNosx7,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-05-07T21:03:47.984+0000)
>
> Yi has counterplay. Fizz's Troll pole counterplays...

If you believe counterplay is good, you should like Fizz's E for that reason.
I don't mind Fizz but, I understand why people hate Fizz. His E counterplays Everything and it's on a low CD. Any hard CC counterplays Yi so not so many complain about him.
E counterplays only skillshits and travel time point an clicks. Dots, zil bombs, channels and other abilities that stick, do over time dmg or tether will still do dmg.

So what your saying is his E counterplays a shit ton of abilities and only a select few abilities can counter it lolz.

Thanks for the correction.

Neither need nerfs to their intended builds.

Fizz needs his tank build removed.
Yi is an annoying feast-or-famine (read: bronze V only) trash pick that needs a rework worse than anyone else in the game, except maybe malzahar and annie.

yi is aggravating when hes ahead but any hard cc will shut him down.

although that said it would be nice if champs like {{champion:11}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:266}} wouldn't build two damage items and then full tank and still be doing shit loads of damage while being really hard to kill
People often defend Yi because he is very rarely unbalanced and is only usually good in lower ELOs. Like now for instance, he has a sub 50% winrate on na.opgg.
